question: Who among the following gave the title 'Sardar' to Vallabhbhai Patel ?
explanation: Mahatma Gandhi gave the title of Sardar to Vallabhbhai Patel for his great organizational skill in Bardoli satyagraha. Vallabhbhai Patel was popularly known as Sardar Patel. He was a freedom fighter. He served as the first Deputy Prime Minister of India.
